Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: It's beautiful here.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: It was our Aunt's. We used to come here as kids. The Order uses it now as a safe house -- what's left of us, at least.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Muggles think these keep evil away. But they're wrong...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I need to talk to the goblin.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How are you?

Name: Griphook
Line: Alive.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You probably don't remember --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes.

Name: Griphook
Line: And brought me here.

Name: Griphook
Line: You are a very unusual wizard.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why did you leave Gringotts?

Name: Griphook
Line: Soon the Death Eaters will control it. That was unacceptable to me.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Then you're on our side.

Name: Griphook
Line: This is a wizard's war. I take no side.

Name: Griphook
Line: It is impossible.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Alone, yes. With you, no.

Name: Griphook
Line: How did you come by this sword?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's complicated. Why did Bellatrix Lestrange think it should be in her vault at Gringotts?

Name: Griphook
Line: It's complicated.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The sword presented itself to us in a moment of need. We didn't steal it.

Name: Griphook
Line: There is a sword in Madam Lestrange's vault identical to this one, but it is a fake. It was placed there this past summer.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And she never suspected?

Name: Griphook
Line: The replica is very convincing. Only a goblin would recognize that this is the true Sword of Gryffindor.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who put it there? The fake.

Name: Griphook
Line: It was not my place to ask, nor did I desire to. There are more than a few curious things in the vaults at Gringotts.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And in Madam Lestrange's vault as well?

Name: Griphook
Line: Perhaps.

Name: Griphook
Line: I have no interest in gold.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Then what? The goblin twists the curl at his chin... then his eyes

Name: Griphook
Line: That is my price.

Name: Griphook
Line: I have your word, Harry Potter, that you will give me the Sword of Gryffindor if I help you?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry, are you thinking there's a Horcrux in Bellatrix's vault?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: She was terrified when she thought we'd been in there. She kept asking you what else we'd taken. I'd bet anything there's a Horcrux there. If we find it, we can kill it. And if we kill it, we're one step closer to killing him.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: And if we find one? How're we supposed to destroy it if we've given Griphook the sword?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm still working on that part.

Name: Fleur Delacour
Line: He's too weak.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Forgive me if I don't get up.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Mr. Ollivander, I need to ask you a few questions.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Anything, m'boy, anything.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Can you identify these, sir?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Walnut and dragon heartstring. Twelve and three quarter inches. Unyielding. This belongs to Bellatrix Lestrange.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And this?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Hawthorn. Unicorn hair. Ten inches. Reasonably pliant. This was the wand of Draco Malfoy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Was? Isn't it still?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Perhaps not -- if you won it from him. I sense its allegiance has changed.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. That much has always been clear to those of us who have studied wandlore.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What do you know about the Deathly Hallows, sir?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: There are rumored to be three: The Elder Wand, the Resurrection Stone and the Invisibility Cloak. It is said that to possess them all is to make oneself the Master of Death. But few truly believe such objects exist --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But you, sir? Do you believe they exist?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're lying. You know one exists and you told him about it. You told him about the Elder Wand and where to go looking for it.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: He tortured me! Besides, I conveyed only rumors. There's no guarantee he will find it --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He has found it, sir.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's all, sir. We'll leave you to get some rest now.

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: He's after you, Mr. Potter. If it's true, what you say, that he has the Elder Wand, I'm afraid you really don't stand a chance.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Then I guess I'll just have to kill him before he finds me, sir.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're sure it's hers?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Positive. Harry turns to the two wands on the table -- the ones he showed Ollivander -- and extends the longest to Hermione.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I reckon you should take this then.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You heard Ollivander. It's Harry's now.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: But I hate that thing -- that's the wand that killed Sirius! How can I hold it and not feel...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: If I can hold it, you can.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: How will we know what it is when we get in there? After all, a Horcrux can be anything.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'll know. I can't explain. It's like...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That's a bit scary.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It is, Harry. Did Dumbledore ever say anything to you, something that might explain why --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. I just know. When one's near.

Name: Fleur Delacour
Line: This is the closest I could find to what you described, Hermione.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It's perfect. Thank you, Fleur.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: You're leaving, aren't you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: In the morning.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: And Griphook?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He'll be leaving too.

Name: Bill Weasley
Line: Listen, I don't know what you're up to, but I know goblins. If you've struck any kind of bargain with Griphook, you must be exceptionally careful to live up to it. If you don't... he won't be forgiving.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: The sky has lost a star.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: My father used to say that when a child died. She looks up, smiles.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah. Funny. Listen, Luna, about your father, I don't want you to think I --

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: I know you understand why my father did what he did, Harry. That's why we don't need to talk about it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hogwarts?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's not the place you left, you

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Neither am I.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Always good value. I'll miss her.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What d'you think?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wouldn't know you if I didn't know you.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You want to tell me what that is?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sirius gave it to me. He had a matching piece. He said if I ever needed him, all I had to do was look into it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You mean he could see you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Something like that. I don't know. He died before I ever got to use it. The thing is...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Go on.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You'll think I'm mental, but more than once, when I've looked into it -- I think I've seen Dumbledore.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell... that's a sight.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Well, how do I look?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hideous.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Oh dear, I missed a spot, didn't I? Hold still...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Couldn't do anything about that bit in the back that's always flipping up, could you? Dead annoying --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Never mind. I'm good.  That is you in there, isn't it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You can give that to Hermione to hold, all right, Griphook?

Name: Goblin
Line: Madam Lestrange.

Name: Griphook
Line: Good morning? Good morning? You're Bellatrix Lestrange, not some dewy-eyed schoolgirl!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hey. Easy.

Name: Griphook
Line: She gives us away and we might as well use that sword to slit our own throats. Understand?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He's right. I was being stupid.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: C'mon. Let's do it.

Name: Goblin
Line: Identification.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: I wish to enter my vault.

Name: Goblin
Line: I see. Very well. Excuse me, won't you?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: I don't like to be kept waiting.

Name: Goblin
Line: Next.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: He's with me.

Name: Griphook
Line: They know!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What do you mean?

Name: Griphook
Line: They know she's an imposter! They've been warned!

Name: Bogrod
Line: Madam Lestrange. Would you mind presenting your wand?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: And why should I do that?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry, what do we do? Harry...?

Name: Bogrod
Line: It's the bank's policy. I'm sure you understand, given the current climate --

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: No, I most certainly do not understand --

Name: Bogrod
Line: I'm afraid I must insist.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Imperio.

Name: Bogrod
Line: Very well, Madam Lestrange. If you will follow me.

Name: Goblin
Line: But... Bogrod, there have been special instructions regarding the Lestrange vault.

Name: Bogrod
Line: I'm fully aware of that. I'm also aware the Lestranges are one of our oldest and most respected families.

Name: Goblin
Line: Yes, sir, but our instructions are very specific --

Name: Bogrod
Line: Let me be specific with you, Ricbert. I've run this bank for forty-five years, long before anyone had even heard of a Death Eater. The day may come that they feel they can run this place better than me, but that day has not yet arrived. Am I understood!

Name: Bogrod
Line: Madam, if you will, I will escort you myself.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How long before they come after us?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's that? Up ahead.

Name: Griphook
Line: I should have known --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What is that, Griphook?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Griphook! What is that!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well done. Hey.

Name: Griphook
Line: The Thief's Downfall. Washes away all enchantments. Can be deadly.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You don't say.  Just out of interest... is there any other way out of here?

Name: Griphook
Line: No.

Name: Bogrod
Line: What the devil are you all doing down here!

Name: Griphook
Line: We need him!

Name: Bogrod
Line: Is this your doing, Griphook? You have no rights here anymore. When you gave up your keys, you --

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Imperio!

Name: Griphook
Line: Well done.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No. It's not possible...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell. That's a Welsh Green.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It looks like it's been down here forever.

Name: Griphook
Line: Go on.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's been trained to expect pain when it hears the noise.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's barbaric. I...

Name: Griphook
Line: We'll only have a few seconds. In other words... they'll be no do-

Name: Griphook
Line: Ready, Bogrod?

Name: Bogrod
Line: Hm? Oh. Yes. Of course.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Lumos !

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Lumos !

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Lumos !

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Blimey...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Look.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No wonder Bellatrix thought it was real.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Is it here, Harry? Can you feel anything?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It's hot! All eyes turn to the bowl, WOBBLING MADLY on the floor, when... it SPLITS APART and begins to MULTIPLY.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ron, your foot!

Name: Griphook
Line: We'll be crushed! Hurry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's it. Up there.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: How're we going to reach it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Give me the sword! The real one.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Keep going!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry! Behind you!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: The cup!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: In here!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We have a deal, Griphook.

Name: Griphook
Line: I said I'd get you in. I never said anything about getting you out.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Griphook! Griphook!

Name: Griphook
Line: Thieves! Help! Thieves!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Foul little git. Least we've got Bogrod.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That's unfortunate.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We can't just stand here! Who's got an idea?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're asking us? You're the brilliant one.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I've got something. But it's mad.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Relashio!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That's your idea?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It doesn't realize it's free!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That was brilliant! BRILLIANT!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We're dropping!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I say we jump!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: When?

Name: Voldemort
Line: The boy has discovered our secret, Nagini. We must find out just how much he knows. We must return to our hiding places and see if the others are safe.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He knows.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: How is it you --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I saw him.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You let him in! Harry, you can't --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I can't always help it, Hermione!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Never mind! What did you see?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's angry. But he's scared too. He's going to make sure the other Horcruxes are safe.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What happens when he finds out four are gone?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I reckon he'll do anything to stop us from finding the rest. There's more: one of them's at Hogwarts.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You saw it?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Tonight? But we have to plan. We have to figure out what --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Honestly, Hermione, when have any of our plans actually worked? We plan, we get there and all hell breaks loose.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: 'Fraid he's right. One problem: Snape's Headmaster now. We can't just walk in the front door.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We'll go to Hogsmeade. To Honeydukes. Take the secret passage in the cellar.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: There's something wrong with him. In the past, I could always follow his thoughts. Now everything feels disconnected.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Maybe it's because of the Horcruxes. Maybe he's growing weaker. Maybe he's dying.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. It's more like he's wounded. If anything, he feels more

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: They were ready for us.

Name: Death Eater
Line: We know you're here, Potter. There's no getting away.

Name: Death Eater
Line: Perhaps you need some convincing.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's he mean by that?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No, you'll give us away.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Expecto Patronum!

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: In here, Potter.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Did you get a look at him! Fora second I thought it was --

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I know.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry! I can see you! In here!

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: You bloody fools! What were you thinking coming here? Do you have any idea how dangerous it is --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're Aberforth.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dumbledore's brother. It's you I've been seeing -- here. It's

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Where've you left him?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's dead.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Sorry to hear it. I liked that elf.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Mundungus Fletcher, 'bout a year ago.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dung had no right selling you that. It belonged to --

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Sirius. Albus told me. He also told me that you'd likely be hacked off if you ever found out I had it. But ask yourself where you'd be if I didn't.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Right then. Reckon you're hungry. Let's get you fed, then think of the best way to get you out of here.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Do you hear much from the others? From the Order?

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: The Order is finished. You-Know- Who's won. Anyone who says otherwise is kidding themselves.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We need to get into Hogwarts. Dumbledore gave us a job to do.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Did he now? Nice job? Easy?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We've been hunting Horcruxes. We think the last one's in the school. But we'll need your help getting in.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: If we can find it and kill it, then we kill him, and then we can end this war once and for all. We need to get into Hogwarts tonight.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: It's not a job my brother's given you, it's a suicide mission. Do yourself a favor boy. Go home. Live a little longer.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dumbledore trusted me, to see this through.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why should he...

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Keep secrets? You tell me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I only care about the Dumbledore I knew. I trusted him.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: Did you now? And why is that?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I had no reason not to —-

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: That's a boy's answer. A boy who goes chasing Horcruxes on the word of a man who won't even tell him where to start. You're lying. Not just to me, which doesn't matter, but to yourself as well. That's what a fool does.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're drunk.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: You don't strike me as a fool, Mr. Potter. So I'll ask you again. There must be a reason. Why do you trust anything my brother ever said to you? Why?

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: You know what to do...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Where've you sent her?

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: You'll see soon enough.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's Ariana, isn't it? Your sister. She's beautiful.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: She'll always be beautiful.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: She died very young, didn't she.

Name: Aberforth Dumbledore
Line: My brother sacrificed many things, Mr. Potter, in his journey to find power, including her. She was devoted to him -- he gave her everything, but time.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Mr. Dumbledore... thank you.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Did save our lives twice. Kept an eye on us in that mirror. That doesn't seem like someone who's given up, does it?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: She's coming back! And she's got someone with her!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who's that with her? Bloody hell...

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: I knew you'd come! I told them alii! Harry Potter would never abandon Hogwarts!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Neville, you look...

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Like hell? I reckon. This is nothing. Seamus is worse. You'll see. Hermione! Ron!

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Hey, Ab. There might be a couple more people on the way.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Well? Ready?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I don't remember this being on the Marauder's Map.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: That's because it never existed till now. The seven secret passages were sealed off before the start of the year. This is the only way in or out now. The grounds are crawling with Death Eaters and Dementors.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: How bad is it, Neville? With Snape as Headmaster.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Hardly ever see him. It's the Carrows you have to watch out for.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The Carrows?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Brother and sister. They're in charge of discipline. Like punishment, the Carrows.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: They did that to you? But why?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Today's Dark Arts lesson had us practicing the Cruciatus Curse. On First Years. I refused. Hogwarts has changed.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Aw, c'mon. Don't be grim. We're all used to it by now. And the thing is, it helps when people stand up, gives everyone hope. I used to notice that when you did it, Harry. C'mon, we're almost there.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Let's have a bit of fun, shall we?  Hey! Listen up, you lot! I've brought you a surprise!

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: Blimey.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Get the word out to Remus and the others that Harry's back.

Name: Nigel Wolpert
Line: River, DA calling. Do you read? We have a new weather report: Lightning has struck. I repeat, lightning has struck...

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Okay, okay! Stand down! lLet's not kill them before You-Know-Who gets the chance!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay. There's something we need to find, something hidden here in the castle. It could help us defeat You-Know-Who.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: What is it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We don't know.

Name: Dean Thomas
Line: Where is it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I realize it's not much to go on.

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: That's nothing to go on.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think it might have something to do with Ravenclaw. It would be small, easy to conceal, valuable. Any ideas?

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Well, there's Rowena Ravenclaw's lost diadem.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: The lost diadem of Ravenclaw? Hasn't anyone ever heard of it? It's quite famous.

Name: Cho Chang
Line: Yes, but Luna, it's lost. For centuries now. There's not a person alive today who's seen it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Excuse me. But would someone tell me: what's a bloody diadem?

Name: Cho Chang
Line: It's a kind of crown. You know, like a tiara.

Name: Cho Chang
Line: Ravenclaw's was rumored to have magical properties, to enhance the wisdom of the wearer.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hey there. Ron smiles, about to speak, then notices Ginny's eyes have not left Harry. He frowns, speaks to Hermione.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Six months she hasn't seen me and it's like I'm Frankie First Year. I mean, I'm only her brother.

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: Got loads of those, though, doesn't she? There's only one Harry.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Shut up, Seamus.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: What is it, Ginny?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Snape knows. He knows that Harry was spotted in Hogsmeade.

Name: Alecto Carrow
Line: Put a smile on, Miss Reynolds. Wouldn't want me to have to pay a visit to Daddy again, would you?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Many of you are surely wondering why I have summoned you here at this hour. It has come to my attention that earlier this evening... Harry Potter was sighted in Hogsmeade.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: I mention this in the hopes that truth will not be supplanted by

Name: Severus Snape
Line: For myself and a few select members of the staff this comes as little surprise. We have, for some time, considered Mr. Potter's return to Hogwarts to be not only possible but inevitable. Consequently, in the past several months and under my specific direction, exhaustive defensive strategies have been employed to defeat any attempt Mr. Potter might make to breach these walls. But know this. Should anyone -- student or staff -- attempt to aid Mr. Potter, that person will be punished in a manner consistent with the severity of their transgression. Rest assured: So long as I am Headmaster at Hogwarts, Harry Potter will never again step foot in this castle.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Now then. If anyone here has knowledge of Mr. Potter's movements this evening... I invite them to step forward now.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think I can help you out with that... -.. Harry appears.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And I'm afraid it's rather extensive.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How dare you stand where he stood.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Tell them how it was that night. Tell then how you looked him in the eye, a man who trusted you... and killed him. Tell them!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm a Gryffindor.

Name: Voldemort
Line: I know that many of you will want to fight. Some of you may even think this wise. But this is foily.

Name: Voldemort
Line: I wish you no harm. TI have great respect for the students of Hogwarts. I was once one myself after all. I ask for but one thing and if granted no magical blood shail be spiit...

Name: Voldemort
Line: Give me Harry Potter. Do this and none shall be harmed. Give me Harry Potter and I shail leave Hogwarts untouched. Give me Harry Potter and you will be rewarded.

Name: Pansy parkinson
Line: But he's there! Potter's there! Someone grab him!

Name: Argus Filch
Line: Students out of bed! Students in the corridors!

Name: Argus Filch
Line: Oh. Sorry, mum.

Name: Argus Filch
Line: Right away.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Time. As much as you can give me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Is that possible, Professor?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think you're right.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You, too, Professor.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Let me get this straight, Professor. You're giving us permission to do this?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: To blow it up. Boom.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Wicked.

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: I can bring 'er down.

Name: Filius Flitwick
Line: You realize, of course, that nothing we do will be able to keep out You-Know-Who indefinitely.

Name: Pomona Sprout
Line: That doesn't mean we can't hold him up.

Name: Professors
Line: Protego Maxima... Finato Duri... Repello Inimicum...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry, Hermione and I have been thinking. It doesn't really matter if we find the Horcrux.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Unless we can destroy it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: So we were thinking --

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You were thinking. It's Ron's idea. And it's brilliant.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You destroyed Tom Riddle's Diary with a Basilisk fang, right? Well, we know where we might find one, don't we?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay. But take this. That way you can find me when you get back.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Where are you going?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ravenclaw Common Room. Got to start somewhere. Hermione nods, slips the Map in her beaded bag and she and Ron head off. Just before they turn the corner, Ron looks back, holds Harry's glance briefly... and then is

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Harry! Wait! I need to talk to

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm a bit preoccupied right now, Luna.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We'll talk later, Luna.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Harry --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Later.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Don't you remember what Cho said about Rowena Ravenclaw's diadem: 'There's not a person alive who's seen it.'

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: It's obvious, isn't it? We have to talk to someone who's dead.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: He's very impressive, isn't he?

Name: Voldemort
Line: They never learn. Such a pity.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Begin.

Name: Pius Thicknesse
Line: But, my Lord, shouldn't we wait --

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Nice night for it!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay, Luna. Who've you got in mind?

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: That's it. I want a charge on each and every joist.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: You do know what you're doing, don't you, Seamus?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Blimey.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Not good.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: If you're to find her, you'll find her down there.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: No. I think it best if you two talk alone. She's very shy.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: Tell Professor McGonagall Remus and I will handle this side of the castle.

Name: Dean Thomas
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: Dean!

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: It's the quality of one's conviction that determines success, not the number of one's followers.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
Line: Who said that?

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Me.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Speaking of quality.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: You shouldn't have. It's Teddy who needs you.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Line: He'll sleep 'til dawn and snore like his father. It's you who needs me tonight.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's you...

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Ha! dal

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Yeah! You and whose army!

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: Woah! Easy up there!

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Sorry.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry talks in his sleep. Haven't you noticed?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No. Of course not.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I've never got this far before.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I'm scared.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Me too. Hermione: I didn't expect it to be like this.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Not this.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're the Grey Lady, the ghost of Ravenclaw Tower.

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: I do not answer to that name.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm sorry. It's Helena, isn't it? Helena Ravenclaw. Rowena's daughter. Luna told me.

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: Are you a friend of Luna's?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes. She thought you might be able to help me.

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: You seek my mother's diadem.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes! That's right --

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: Luna is kind. Unlike so many of the others, but she was wrong. I cannot help you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wait! Please!

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: Many have sought my mother's diadem. Its powers are

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I don't care about its powers! Honestly --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't seek it for myself! You have to believe me!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I want to destroy it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's what you want, isn't it, Helena? You want it destroyed.

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: But I only wanted to be more like her, clever and wise. She wore it so beautifully, but on me... I grew to hate it... the pain I felt... the pain I feel even now...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'll end your pain, Helena. Tell me where it is and I'll destroy it, I swear, on my mother's memory —-

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: Another swore to destroy it, many years ago, a strange boy with a strange name...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Tom Riddle --

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: But he lied.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's lied to many people --

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: I know what he's done! I know who he is! He defiled it! With Dark Magic!

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: Strange... you remind me of him a bit...

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: It's here. In the castle. In the

Name: Helena Ravenclaw
Line: If you have to ask, you'll never know. If you know, you need only ask...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you... -.. then turning...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you... -.. then running.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You do it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yes, you can.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Not good.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Ready!?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Are you bloody joking?!

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: He's good...

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: He's good...

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: What?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: That was kind of exciting. Seamus grins and winks knowingly. Ginny shakes her head.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Mad. The both of you.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Not good.

Name: Argus Filch
Line: Night-tee night.

Name: Pansy parkinson
Line: You let us out of here, you filthy squib!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ginny! Neville! You alright?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Never better! Feel like I could spit fire! Haven't seen Luna, have you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Luna -- ?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: I'm mad for her! Think it's about time I told her, seeing as there's a pretty good chance we'll both be dead by dawn!

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: I know.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell. We/'ll never find him on this.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: There he is.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Brilliant.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He vanished. Just now. I saw it. Ron glances at MAP -- then:

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's right. I did.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Let's go.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Brilliant.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Take my hand.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Well, well, what brings you here, Potter? Harry looks slowly over his shoulder. Draco -- Blaise and Goyle at his side -- steps INTO VIEW, his face bisected by light. He holds a wand on Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I could ask you the same.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I virtually lived here last year. Remember?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I remember.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's wrong with the one you have?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Easy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why didn't you tell her?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Bellatrix. You knew it was me. But you didn't say anything.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Give me my wand.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. I don't think so...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Besides, its allegiance is to me now. If you want it, you'll have to win it back. Perhaps even kill me...

Name: Gregory Goyle
Line: C'mon, Draco. Don't be a prat.

Name: Gregory Goyle
Line: Avada Kedavra!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Expelliarmus!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Did you see where it went? The diadem!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well done. Let's find Ron and get out of here.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: RUN! Goyle's set the bioody place on fire!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Split up!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Do we climb!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, it''ll just follow us!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Here! Take one!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Serves him right.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: C'mon! This way!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wait! What about Malfoy and Blaise!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Brilliant.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Nagini. Come.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're bloody well welcome!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron, you once asked me if I thought he felt it -- Voldemort -- when we destroy a Horcrux, when we destroy a piece of his soul.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He does.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's the snake. She's the last one. The last Horcrux.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Where will he take her?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Someplace safe.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. He'll keep her close.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Look inside him, Harry.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Find out where he is. If we find him, we find the snake. Then we're one step closer to ending this.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Stop looking at her. She smells your fear. It agitates her. Be grateful she's just eaten.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Forgive me, my Lord, but wouldn't it be more prudent to call off this battle and seek the boy yourself?

Name: Voldemort
Line: I do not need to seek the boy! Before the night is out, he will come to me! Do you understand!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Of c-course, my Lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: How do you live with yourself, Lucius?  Go. Find Severus. Tell him I need to see him immediately.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I know where he is.

Name: Sybill Trelawney
Line: There's more to me than incense and tea leaves, Mr. Finnegan.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Thanks.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Don't mention it.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Why doesn't it work for me?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You have performed extraordinary magic with this wand, my Lord. In the last few hours alone --

Name: Voldemort
Line: No! I am extraordinary! But the wand resists me!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: There is no wand more powerful. Ollivander himself said it. Tonight, when the boy comes to you, it will not fail you, I am sure. It answers to you and you only.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Does it?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: My Lord?

Name: Voldemort
Line: The wand. Does it truly answer to me?

Name: Voldemort
Line: You're a clever man, Severus. Surely you must know.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Where, Severus? Where does its loyalty lie?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: With you, of course, my Lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: The Elder Wand cannot serve me properly, Severus, because I am

Name: Voldemort
Line: The Elder Wand belongs to the wizard who killed its last owner. Ollivander was quite explicit about that. You killed Dumbledore, Severus. While you live, the Elder Wand cannot be truly mine.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: My Lord --

Name: Voldemort
Line: You have been a good and faithful servant, Severus.

Name: Voldemort
Line: But only I can live forever...

Name: Voldemort
Line: Kill.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Nagini! Come!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Take them...

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Take them!

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Please.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Give me something! Quickly! A flask! Anything.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: They are the same...

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You have your mother's eyes...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: He's gone. The snake too.

Name: Voldemort
Line: You have fought valiantly... but in vain. I do not wish this. Every drop of magical bliood

Name: Voldemort
Line: I therefore command my forces to retreat. In their absence, dispose of your dead with dignity. Treat your injured.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Never! Do you hear me! NEVER!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Where is everyone?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Lily... Then...

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Lily! Come out of there! Now!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: We're going home.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: She's jealous. Because she's ordinary and you're special.

Name: Lily Potter
Line: That's mean.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: It's true. You know so yourself.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: No! Don't kill me!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: That wasn't my intention.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Stand up, Severus. I haven't much time. What message do you bring from Lord Voldemort this time?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Is this about the Prophecy?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Yes.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: How much did you relay?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Only what I heard. But now... he thinks it refers to her.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The Prophecy did not refer to a woman. It spoke of a boy born at the end of July --

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Yes! But he thinks it's her son! He intends to hunt them down now! To kill them!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: If she means so much to you, surely Lord Voldemort would spare her in exchange for the boy.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: I have asked.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You disgust me. You would sacrifice the life of an innocent child over a schoolboy crush?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: She's more than that! She's different! Beautiful. Kind.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And should I do so, what will you give me in return, Severus?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Anything.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You said you would keep her safe!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Lily and James put their faith in the wrong person. Rather like you, Severus.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The boy survives.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: He has her eyes.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: He doesn't need protection. The Dark Lord has gone --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The Dark Lord will return. And the boy will be in terrible danger when he does.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: No one can know. Your word.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: My word that I shall never reveal the best of you, Severus? If you insist.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: He exhibits no measurable talent. His arrogance rivals even his father's. And he seems to relish his fame.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Sometimes we see what we expect to see, Severus. Other teachers indicate the boy is modest, likeable and while no prodigy, possesses above-average gifts. Personally, I find him rather engaging.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You see what you want to see.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Perhaps. oOh. Severus.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Why did you put it on? Surely you realized it carried a curse.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I was... foolish... greedy...

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Drink the rest. It will contain the curse to the hand for the time being.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: For the time being?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: It will spread.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: How long?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Maybe a year.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Well, this makes matters much more straightforward.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Do not ignore me, Severus. Was it not you who told me of Lord Voldemort's plan to have the Malfoy boy murder me?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: It is not expected that he will succeed.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You must agree.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes. You must be the one to kill me, Severus. It is the only way. Only then will the Dark Lord trust you completely.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You ask too much.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There will come a time when Harry Potter must be told something. But you must wait until Voldemort is at his most vulnerable.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Tell him what?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: On the night Lord Voldemort went to Godric's Hollow to kill Harry, and Lily Potter cast herself between them, the curse rebounded. When that happened, a part of Lord Voldemort's soul latched itself onto the only living thing it could find: Harry himself.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There's a reason Harry can speak with snakes. There's a reason he can look into Lord Voldemort's mind. A part of Lord Voldemort lives inside him.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: So when the time comes, the boy must die.

Name: Severus Snape
Line: You've kept him alive so that he can die at the proper moment. You've been raising him like a pig for slaughter.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: But this is touching, Severus. Don't tell me you've grown to care for the boy?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Expecto Patronum!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Lily. After all this time?

Name: Severus Snape
Line: Always... We GO TO BLACK...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The irony of course, Severus, is that -- in the end -- you and the boy desire the same thing...

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Where've you been?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We thought you'd gone to the forest, we thought you might be --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm going there now.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Are you mad! No!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's... meant to be.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Rubbish! You can't just give yourself up to him -- Hermione squeezes Ron's arm, silencing him.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What is it, Harry? What is it you

Name: Harry Potter
Line: There's a reason I can... hear them -- the Horcruxes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think I've known for awhile.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I'll go with you. I/'ll --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Kill the snake. Kill the snake and then it's just him. Then it will be over.

Name: Oliver Wood
Line: I'll take him from here.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: It's all right. We're going to get you inside.

Name: Student
Line: I kept calling. No one came.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Don't worry. I won't leave you. I promise.

Name: Lily Potter
Line: You've been so brave, sweetheart.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why are you here? All of you?

Name: Lily Potter
Line: We never left, dear.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Does it hurt? Dying?

Name: Sirius Black
Line: Quicker than falling asleep.

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: And he will want it to be quick.

Name: James Potter
Line: You're nearly there, son.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm sorry. I didn't want any of you to die for me. And Remus, your son...

Name: Remus Lupin
Line: Others will tell him what his mother and father died for. Someday he'll understand...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You'll stay with me?

Name: James Potter
Line: Until the end.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He won't be able to see you?

Name: Sirius Black
Line: No. We're here, you see.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stay close to me.

Name: Lily Potter
Line: Always...

Name: Corban Yaxley
Line: No sign of him, my Lord.

Name: Voldemort
Line: I thought he would come. I was, it seems... mistaken.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You weren't.

Name: Corban Yaxley
Line: Quiet!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Harry Potter. The Boy Who Lived. Come to die. Nagini HISSES behind her protective guard of Death Eaters. Harry's gaze shifts to her when Voldemort raises

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You cannot help.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Harry. You wonderful boy. You brave, brave man. Let us walk.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, this, is this... I mean, forgive me, but you are dead, aren't you, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh, yes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Then... I'm dead too?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Not.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I didn't defend myself. I let him kill me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's true, isn't it, sir? A bit of him lives in me, doesn't it?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Did. It was just destroyed only moments ago by none other than Voldemort himself.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You were the seventh Horcrux, Harry; the Horcrux he never meant to make.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And you knew this? That's why you were certain I wouldn't die?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Certain? No. Little is certain in this world, Harry. Call it an educated guess.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor, is that -- ?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Exactly where are we, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I was going to ask you that. Where would you say that we are?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It looks like King's Cross station -- only a lot cleaner. And without the trains.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: King's Cross! Is that right? Well, this is, as they say, your party.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, why didn't you just tell me about the Deathly Hallows?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You will have to forgive me, Harry. You see... I didn't trust

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I feared that you would make the same mistake I made, that you would be intoxicated by the power the Hallows promise their possessor. But I crave your pardon, Harry. It's clear to me now, as it should have been all along, that you are the better man.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir --

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You are the worthy possessor of the Hallows, Harry, not me. I was fit to own the Elder Wand, because I took it not for gain, but to save others from it. But I took the Stone because I longed to recall someone who has long been at peace and for that I paid with my life.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You wanted to see Ariana again, didn't you, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I used the Stone as well, sir, only a little while ago when I entered the Forest. I saw my mum and dad, and Sirius and Lupin...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: True. But ask yourself this: were you calling them? Or were they calling you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've got to go back, haven't I?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: That is up to you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've got a choice?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh yes. We are in King's Cross, you say? I think, should you so decide, you would be able to, let's say, board a train.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And where would it take me?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: On.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Voldemort's got the Elder Wand.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: True.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And the snake lives.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And I've nothing to kill it with.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: 'Help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.'

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I have always prized my ability to turn a phrase -- words are, in my

Name: Harry Potter
Line: With all due respect, sir, I think what we need here is a miracle.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I've never put much stock in miracles, Harry. On the other hand, I can attest wholly to the extensive advantages of a related phenomenon.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Which would be, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Luck.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living and, above all, those who live without love.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, my mother's Patronus. It was a doe, wasn't it? Just like Professor Snape's. Curious, don't you think?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Actually, if I think about it... it doesn't seem curious at all.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Is this real? Or has this been happening inside my head?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry. But why should that mean that it is not real?

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: My lord, let me help you --

Name: Voldemort
Line: I do not require assistance.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: The boy. Is he dead?

Name: Narcissa Malfoy
Line: Is he alive? Draco?

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Don't despair, Longbottom. I put you in Gryffindor for good reason...

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Who's that?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: ... Hagrid's carrying?

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Neville, who is that?

Name: Arthur Weasley
Line: What's going on here, Neville?

Name: Voldemort
Line: Behold, Nagini. Our work is done.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: No... NO!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Stupid girl. You cry for that?

Name: Voldemort
Line: While your hands ran dark with the blood of mothers and sons, fathers and daughters, brothers and sisters, his were clasped in prayer -- but it was a prayer for one and one only. While you battled courageously, until you could no longer will yourself to stand, he had long since fallen to his knees. While you cursed me until your voices grew ragged, he begged me for mercy in a voice as meek as a child's.

Name: Voldemort
Line: So do not cry for that. He's not worthy of your tears. And do not despair of his betrayal. You were never in his heart. Not for one single solitary beat.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Liar!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Did you not hear me! Harry Potter is dead! From this day forward, you put your faith in me or suffer the consequences. HARRY POTTER Is

Name: Voldemort
Line: Now is the time to declare yourself.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Draco...

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Draco, don't be stupid --

Name: Narcissa Malfoy
Line: Come, Draco.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: He saved your life.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Well done, Draco. Who will be next? Hm? Come now, don't be shy.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Well, I must say, I'd hoped for better. Is this truly the best Hogwarts has to offer?

Name: Voldemort
Line: Who might you be, young man?

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Neville Longbottom.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Well, welcome, Neville. I'm sure we can find a place for you in our ranks.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Someone has to do the washing.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Now, now, Bellatrix. Let's not underestimate our young friend. By stepping forward, he lives to see another day...

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: I'd like to say something.

Name: Voldemort
Line: Very well, Neville. I'm sure we'd all be fascinated to hear what you have to say.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: It doesn't matter that Harry is gone. A troubled MURMUR ripples through the crowd.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: This isn't over.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Potter! Harry turns. Draco's hand whips forward and -- to Harry's shock -- tosses him his wand. Ron GRINS.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Well done, Malfoy!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Confringo!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The snake! We've got to kill the snake!

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Harry! Look out!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Nagini! With me!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Leave her!

Name: Voldemort
Line: I said LEAVE HER!

Name: Voldemort
Line: Nagini

Name: Voldemort
Line: Die! Die

Name: Voldemort
Line: Why do you live!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because I have something worth living for.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Confringo!

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Come on, granny, give us your best.

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Back off, boys! She's mine!  You will never touch my chiidren again!

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Line: Be thankful we only took one. Besides...

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hermione!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Yes!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I don't want you to say anything you wouldn't say if we weren't about to be killed by a giant snake! It'll just ruin it!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You were right.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: When you told Professor Snape it was failing you. It will always fail you.

Name: Voldemort
Line: It belongs to me! I killed Snape!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Together.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What's the matter with her?

Name: Sybill Trelawney
Line: There's more to me than incense and tea leaves, Mr. Finnegan.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I told you: it's useless to you.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Not exactly leaving the place better than we found it, are we?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Something my mum used to say.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Why didn't it work for him? The Elder wand.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because it answers to another.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: When he killed Snape, he thought the wand would become his. But the thing is... it never belonged to Snape.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But that means...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It answers to me.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What do you reckon we should do with it?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, it wasn't boring, was it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Together?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Don't forget to give Professor Longbottom our best.

Name: Albus Potter
Line: Will there really be thestrals pulling the carriages?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: There's nothing scary about thestrals. They're gentle things. Anyway, you won't be going up to school in the carriages. You/'be going in the boats, remember?

Name: Albus Potter
Line: Dad?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes?

Name: Albus Potter
Line: What if I'm put in Slytherin?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Albus Severus Potter. You were named after two Headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin. And he was probably the bravest man I ever knew.

Name: Albus Potter
Line: But just say I am --

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Then Slytherin House will have gained a wonderful wizard. But listen, if it means so much to you, you can choose Gryffindor. The Sorting Hat takes your choice into account.

Name: Albus Potter
Line: Really?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Really.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ready?

Name: Albus Potter
Line: Ready.
